title: 105B-Reynard: Ferocious Mr. Fox
itunes:title: 105B-Reynard: Ferocious Mr. Fox
description:
!*!*! We've been nominated for a Webby! If you get a chance, it would be amazing if you'd vote for Myths and Legends: http://wbby.co/pod-writ Thanks! !*!*! Reynard, having received a pardon from the Lion who was a King, is up to his old tricks. Like, immediately. He bit the head off the rabbit that was accompanying him on a holy pilgrimmage before he even left the kingdom. Of course, the ground is shrinking beneath Reynard, and it won't be long before the fox who needs to deceive to survive runs into the king's justice and the king will only fall for the same lies so many times. -- Sponsors Check out Breach, a new podcast that takes you inside the world's biggest hacks On Apple Podcasts On Stitcher Amazon Music Unlimited has millions of songs and you can start a 30-day trial free at http://amazonmusic.com -- Music "When we set out" by Podington Bear "Bit Rio" by Podington Bear "Massive Attack" by Podington Bear "Puppy" by Podington Bear "Bell Solo" by Podington Bear "Mystery Coat" by Blue Dot Sessions "Noe Noe" by Blue Dot Sessions

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
